alert.note: Alert for Dent (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 6:13PM CDT until May 08 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Dent County in south central Missouri... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 613 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Viburnum, or 13 miles east of Salem, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stone Hill, Howes Mill and Boss. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
